title: F1 Fantasy: top picks & predictions for the 2025 Dutch GP
summary: Will their be a different F1 Fantasy star this weekend? Here are our predictions; tips on drivers to avoid; which chips to play and further analysis

qa_pairs.question: What is the primary focus of F1 Fantasy games?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Selecting drivers and teams to earn points based on their real-world performance.

qa_pairs.question: In F1 Fantasy, what is the purpose of using chips?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To boost points scoring potential for drivers or teams during a race weekend.

qa_pairs.question: Why might a player choose to avoid certain drivers in F1 Fantasy?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Due to their poor recent performance or unfavorable track conditions.
wrong_options: Because of their popularity among fans.
